data.eml:eml: A review of the China-Himalayan members of the subfamily Euplocaminae (Insecta: Lepidoptera: Tineidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Guo-Hua, Hirowatari, Toshiya, Wang, Min (2010): A review of the China-Himalayan members of the subfamily Euplocaminae (Insecta: Lepidoptera: Tineidae). Zootaxa 2511: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196055
